h3.a: All school events have been cancelled due to COVID-19 school closure.

Click here to go to the Blackhawk Coronavirus Information page

span.div: For anyone struggling with thoughts of self harm, thoughts of suicide, or struggling with mental health, especially during this period of social distancing, there is a number that anyone can text 24 hours a day to speak with someone. The number is 741 741.
If you need assistance finding food, paying housing bills, accessing free childcare, or other essential services, please click: http://www.211.org/services/covid19

div.a: How to get tested for COVID-19

div.span:
Coronavirus Can't Stop the Yearbook
You can still order the BHS 2020 Yearbook.
You can still order a senior baby ad.
And we'd love you to share some pictures of BHS students during the Coronavirus Quarantine.
(Part-time jobs, online learning, masks, social distancing ...)
Click here to do all three: https://www.yearbookordercenter.com/?event=general.displayLanding&jobnumber=13272
Thanks,
BHS Yearbook Staff
(Questions? Email mccowinj@bsd.k12.pa.us)

Click HERE to request a LOGIN for Kindergarten Registration.
This is ONLY for parents NEW to Blackhawk School District.

span.div: Enrollment is now open for the Pre-K program for the 2020-2021 school year. This is for 3 & 4 year old children who meet eligibility requirements. Please see the attached letter and application. Contact Jen DuBrowa @ jennifer.dubrowa@westernbeaver.org or (724) 643-9310 x4018

strong.span: This number is for NON-EMERGENCY calls. If you have an emergency, call 911.

span.br:
500 Blackhawk Road
Beaver Falls, PA 15010
Phone: (724) 846-6600 | Fax: (724) 846-2021
